modName: Hunter Archer Armor - Fixed and Translated
summary: Translates the original mod to english and includes a vampire fix
descriptionHtml:
This is simply a translation of [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4806968]Protese's[/url] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43649/?tab=description]Hunter Archer Armor[/url] that includes a [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70808]vampire fix[/url] originally made by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2037066]Vallenvega[/url]. Credits go to both of them, i only translated the mod to english.
I know there was already a translation available for this mod, but it didn't include the vampire fix, so i decided to upload this one.
This fix requires the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43649/?tab=description]original mod[/url] to work, as it only contains an .esp.
Make sure to endorse both Protese's and Vallenvega's mods too if you liked this one.
author: Mateo

files.name: Hunter Archer Armor - Fixed and Translated
